body_html:
Personally I dont care about summary viev :)
Its more important, that in this setup, Keras optimizer could not optimize tf-variables. It's strange, cause all of them (Keras and TF layers) was made with tensorflow.python.layers. And all of them have add_weigth method, and use it.

When, what metadata does Keras need? Or where can something go wrong?

Its more important, that in this setup, Keras optimizer could not optimize tf-variables. It's strange, cause all of them (Keras and TF layers) was made with tensorflow.python.layers. And all of them have add_weigth method, and use it.
When, what metadata does Keras need? Or where can something go wrong?
body:
Personally I dont care about summary viev :)
Its more important, that in this setup, Keras optimizer could not optimize tf-variables. It's strange, cause all of them (Keras and TF layers) was made with `tensorflow.python.layers`. And all of them have `add_weigth` method, and use it.

When, what metadata does Keras need? Or where can something go wrong?
